title: Pixel 2 photos wont update
content: Since about 2 weeks ago my google photos won't update, when I launch it says it requires an update but if I click update it wont load the store and i can't get into my photos. When i tried to update it straight from the store it won't update saying there is an issue. I even tried uninstalling and reinstalling and clearing cashe but nothing worked, Photos is currently unusable.
